title: iHerb Product Scraper
description: Scrape products from iHerb. Provide either keyword/category OR an iHerb URL (startUrl, url, or startUrls). Actor paginates and scrapes product detail pages.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Multiple iHerb entry points (category, search, or product URLs). Supports objects with `url` or `requestsFromUrl` fields.

url.title: Start URL (if not using Keyword/Category)
url.description: Single iHerb entry point (category, search, or product URL).

keyword.title: Keyword (if not using Start URL)
keyword.description: Product search keyword(s), e.g., 'Vitamin C', 'Protein Powder'.

category.title: Category (optional)
category.description: Optional product category to filter by (e.g., 'vitamins', 'supplements').

location.title: Market / Location
location.description: iHerb domain prefix or full origin (e.g., 'www', 'ru', 'https://au.iherb.com'). Defaults to www.iherb.com.

language.title: Accept-Language header
language.description: Custom Accept-Language header value (e.g., 'en-US,en;q=0.9'). Leave empty to use a random desktop locale.

collectDetails.title: Collect product details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens product detail pages for full data extraction.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of products
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of products to collect. Leave empty to collect all available products.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of category/listing pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (datacenter recommended for iHerb).

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw 'Cookie' header string. Can help bypass consent banners.

cookiesJson.title: Custom cookies (JSON)
cookiesJson.description: Optional JSON-formatted cookies. Accepts an array (e.g., [{"name":"a","value":"1"}]) or an object map (e.g., {"a":"1"}).

dedupe.title: Deduplicate results
dedupe.description: Remove duplicate product URLs from results (in-memory deduplication).
